nhc_headline: ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING AND A FEW TORNADOES FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN MID-ATLANTIC AND NEW ENGLAND STATES...
summary:
...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING AND A FEW TORNADOES FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN MID-ATLANTIC AND NEW ENGLAND STATES...
 As of 11:00 AM EDT Wed Jul 10
 the center of Beryl was located near 42.0, -83.9
 with movement NE at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.
